title: GIFT University
text:
The GIFT University (formerly Gujranwala Institute of Future Technologies) is a <a href="private%20university">private university</a> located in <a href="Gujranwala">Gujranwala</a>, <a href="Punjab%2C%20Pakistan">Punjab, Pakistan</a>. It is only <a href="University%20charter">chartered</a> University in region Gujranwala. It was established in 2002. 
 The university offers degree programs in various fields such as <a href="business%20administration">business administration</a>, accounting and finance, <a href="psychology">psychology</a>, <a href="mass%20communication">mass communication</a>, <a href="education">education</a>, <a href="computer%20science">computer science</a>, <a href="information%20technology">information technology</a>, <a href="software%20engineering">software engineering</a>, <a href="electrical%20engineering">electrical engineering</a>, <a href="home%20economics">home economics</a>, <a href="Textile%20Design">textile</a> and <a href="fashion%20design">fashion design</a> and English language and literature etc.
